brandCompliance.palettePolicy: Primary gold gradient + black/white dominate. Secondary colors are accent-only. Tertiary is charts-only.
forbiddenWithoutPermission: decorative pattern overlays on dense product surfaces

primary.class: rounded-md px-4 py-2 text-sm font-medium transition-opacity

secondary.class: rounded-md px-4 py-2 text-sm font-medium transition-colors

ghost.class: rounded-md px-4 py-2 text-sm font-medium transition-colors

destructive.class: rounded-md px-3 py-1.5 text-xs font-medium transition-colors

input.base: w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-foreground transition-colors

select.base: rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-foreground transition-colors

textarea.base: w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-foreground transition-colors min-h-[80px]

card.base: rounded-lg border border-border bg-card text-card-foreground shadow-sm

cardInteractive.base: rounded-lg border border-border bg-card p-4 shadow-sm transition-[box-shadow,border-color]

nav.container: border-b border-border bg-card shadow-sm px-4 py-3
nav.logoSlot: Top-left reserved zone; preserve clear space around approved logo; never stretch image.
nav.tagline: Use only approved copy as optional sign-off/beneath logo when legal-approved.

toast.container: fixed right-4 top-4 z-50 flex w-[min(24rem,calc(100%-2rem))] flex-col gap-2
toast.dismiss: rounded px-2 py-1 text-xs font-semibold hover:bg-background/50 transition-colors

badge.base: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold

table.cell: border-b border-border px-4 py-3 text-left text-sm

emptyState.wrapper: rounded-lg border border-border bg-card p-8 text-center shadow-sm

errorState.block: rounded-md border border-destructive/30 bg-destructive/5 px-4 py-3 text-sm text-destructive

loadingState.spinner: h-5 w-5 animate-spin rounded-full border-2 border-border border-t-primary

states.hover: Use for links and clickable cards; transition 150ms.
states.focus: Always visible focus ring (2px ring, 2px offset) for keyboard users.
states.activePressed: Optional slight opacity or background darken.
states.error: Border or text destructive; associate with aria-invalid and aria-describedby.

accessibility.focusRing: All interactive elements must show focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 (or equivalent).
accessibility.contrast: Text on background must meet WCAG 2.1 AA (4.5:1 normal text, 3:1 large).
automatedChecks: bg-primary and bg-gold-gradient must pair with text-black/text-primary-foreground only
bg-black must pair with text-white, text-light-gold, or text-dark-gold
accessibility.keyboard: All actions available via keyboard; tab order logical; no trap without escape.
accessibility.forms: Labels associated (for/id or aria-label); errors linked via aria-describedby; required indicated.
